BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.AgendaNote: Jointly with the Committee on Transportation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to standards and specifications for accessible water borne commuter services facilities for disabled persons in New York City.
Items.MatterName: Standards and specifications for accessible facilities and passenger ferry water borne transportation services for disabled individuals in NYC.
